name: New Oriental Education & Technology Group Inc.
description: New Oriental Education & Technology Group Inc. is a leading provider of private educational services in China, offering a wide range of educational programs and services. Founded in 1993 by Michael Yu, the company has grown to become one of the largest and most recognized brands in the Chinese education sector. New Oriental specializes in language training, test preparation, and K-12 tutoring, catering to a diverse student population from young children to adult learners. The company operates a network of learning centers across major cities in China, providing both in-person and online educational offerings. New Oriental is known for its innovative teaching methods and a strong focus on academic excellence, helping students succeed in competitive exams such as the TOEFL, GRE, and SAT. In addition to traditional education, New Oriental has expanded its services to include overseas study consulting, vocational training, and educational materials. The company's mission is to foster educational reform and innovation in China, making high-quality education accessible to all. As the education landscape continues to evolve, New Oriental remains committed to providing comprehensive learning solutions and adapting to the changing needs of students and parents alike.

seo.meta_title: New Oriental Education & Technology Group Inc. | Leading Private Education Provider in China
seo.meta_description: Explore New Oriental Education & Technology Group Inc., a top provider of private educational services in China. Discover their programs, mission, and impact on education.

faq.question: What services does New Oriental provide?
faq.answer: New Oriental provides language training, test preparation, K-12 tutoring, and vocational training.

faq.question: Who founded New Oriental?
faq.answer: New Oriental was founded by Michael Yu in 1993.

faq.question: Where is New Oriental headquartered?
faq.answer: New Oriental is headquartered in Beijing, China.

faq.question: What are New Oriental's main educational offerings?
faq.answer: New Oriental's main offerings include TOEFL, GRE, and SAT preparation, as well as K-12 tutoring.

faq.question: Is New Oriental a publicly traded company?
faq.answer: Yes, New Oriental is publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol EDU.
